segments.text: Look , it's all water over the dam now . Let's leave it behind us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I know , but it's too hard to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our eyes should look into the future . We could not live in the past .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Only sometimes when I think about it , I feel very sad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's normal . Time will change everything .
segments.speaker: S1
